name: Bringing the cloud on prem with Bryan Cantrill & Steve Tuck (Changelog & Friends #8)
summary: Adam was out when Bryan made his podcast debut here on The Changelog, so we had to get him back on the show along with his co-founder and CEO Steve Tuck to discuss Silicon Valley (the TV show), all things Oxide, homelab possibilities, bringing the power of the cloud on prem, and more.
